title: Ep 47 - How To Manage Your Emotions
itunes:title: Ep 47 - How To Manage Your Emotions
description:
In this episode I talk about how when our emotions are running high, it is never the best idea for us to talk to someone else or make a decision. I dig into the concept of what it means by when emotions are high, logic is low and how you can use it in your every day life.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
